definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: go about (maliciously, as slanderer; cf. Ar. mu4a0h;un and sa9in slanderer, from √ √ ma4ay wallk along, sa9ay walk quickly), slander, Pf. 3 ms. [[עַל־לשׁׂנוֹ]] ´[[לאׂ־ר]]: Ps 15:3, he talks no slander upon his tongue (‖[[דּׂבֵר אֱמֶת ]] v:Ps 15:2).

go about as explorer, spy, c. acc. loc. Nu 21:32, Jos 6:25, Jos 7:2, Jos 7:2, Jos 14:7 (all JE), Ju Jdg 18:2 (‖[[תָקַר ]]), v:Jdg 18:14, v:Jdg 18:17, 2Sa 10:3 (‖[[חָקַר ז]]), 1Ch 19:3, so also pt. Ge 42:30 (E), Jos 6:22 (JE); pt., acc. om., as adj., [[אֲנָשִׁים מְרַגְּלִים]] Jos 2:1, cf. Jos 6:23 (both JE); as subst., spies 1Sa 26:4, 2Sa 15:10, and so perh. (as pred.) Ge 42:9, Ge 42:11, Ge 42:14, Ge 42:16, Ge 42:31, Ge 42:34 (all E).

definitions.title: Tiph.
definitions.body: , Pf. 1 S.[[תִּרְגַּלְתִּי לְאֶפְרַיִם]] Ho 11:3 I taught Ephr. to walk (si vera 1.; v. Ges:§ 55 h).
